<<<<<<< HEAD
Mechanick exercises, or, The doctrine of handy-works by Joseph Moxon. Moxon, Joseph, 1627-1691.
The second edition with additions.
[4], 234, 64 [i.e. 46] p., [27] leaves of plates : ill.
Printed and sold by J. Moxon, London : 1693-1701.
Each of the sections has special t.p. with varying imprint dates. Pagination is continuous, except for the last section "Brick-layers work", which has separate pagination. Reproduction of original in the British Library. Smithing--Joinery--House-carpentry--Turning--Brick-layers work.
=======
Mechanick exercises, or, The doctrine of handy-works by Joseph Moxon. Moxon, Joseph, 1627-1691.
The second edition with additions.
[4], 234, 64 [i.e. 46] p., [27] leaves of plates : ill.
Printed and sold by J. Moxon, London : 1693-1701.
Each of the sections has special t.p. with varying imprint dates. Pagination is continuous, except for the last section "Brick-layers work", which has separate pagination. Reproduction of original in the British Library. Smithing--Joinery--House-carpentry--Turning--Brick-layers work.
J. Moxon
J. Moxon
